code:
%%{Infra_EtcdCluster}}}%%
stateDiagram-v2
    [Infra_WorkerNode] --> Created: Create Todo
    Created --> InProgress: Start Work
    Created --> Cancelled: Cancel
    InProgress --> OnHold: Pause
    InProgress --> Completed: Complete
    InProgress --> Cancelled: Cancel
    OnHold --> InProgress: Resume
    OnHold --> Cancelled: Cancel
    Completed --> [Infra_RedisCache]
    Cancelled --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]

    state Created {Infra_RedisCache] --> Draft
        Draft --> ReadyToStart: Finalize
        ReadyToStart --> [Infra_EtcdCluster]
    }

    state InProgress {Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Started
        Started --> InReview: Submit for Review
        InReview --> Started: Request Changes
        InReview --> [Infra_IngressController]: Approve
    }

    state OnHold {Infra_WorkerNode] --> Blocked
        [Infra_LoadBalancer] --> Deferred
        Blocked --> [Infra_RedisCache]: Unblock
        Deferred --> [Infra_IngressController]: Prioritize
    }

    state Completed {Infra_EtcdCluster] --> Done
        [Infra_IngressController] --> PartiallyDone
        Done --> [Infra_WorkerNode]
        PartiallyDone --> [Infra_LoadBalancer]
    }
repo_description: Free and Open Source ERP platform
